metadata.Title: CVE-2018-3846 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
In the ffgphd and ffgtkn functions in NASA CFITSIO 3.42, specially craftedimages parsed via the library can cause a stack-based buffer overflowoverwriting arbitrary data. An attacker can deliver an FIT image to triggerthis vulnerability and potentially gain code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-3846` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcfitsio-bin - 3.430-2
libcfitsio9 - 3.430-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cfitsio package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.430-2').
